notes.note: Add Quickshare buttons to Context menu
Support for add-ons to create new home page panels with Firefox Hub
Allow for hiding home page panels
Locales added: Belarusian [be], Argentine Spanish [es-AR], Mexican Spanish [es-MX], Indonesian [id], Latvian [lv], Malay [ms]
Disallow calling WebIDL constructors as functions on the web
Fixes to box-shadow and other visual overflow (see bug 480888)
Mute and volume available per window when using WebAudio
Use of line-height allowed for <input type="reset|button|submit">

ES6 array and generator comprehensions implemented (read [docs][1] for more details)


  [1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/Firefox/Releases/30
Error stack now contains column number

Support for alpha option in canvas context options (feature [description][1])


  [1]: http://blogs.adobe.com/webplatform/2014/04/01/new-canvas-features/

CSS Property 'line-height' has no effects on input text fields (see [349259][1]) 


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=349259

Ignore autocomplete="off" when offering to save passwords via the password manager (see [956906][1]) 


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=956906

TypedArrays don't support new named properties (see [695438][1]) 


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=695438

Thick lines on some pages (see [1014333][1])


  [1]: http://bugzilla.mozilla.org/1014333
